name: Femboy Bangers - Pub & Grill
description:
Monday morning and you have time to spare before work.
You decide to grab a coffee at a famous restaurant, recommended to you by a close friend.

Your visit to Femboy Bangers turns into a memorable encounter with various employees, eager to please.
Don't forget to tip your waiter!

Read through an exciting story as well as some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
~6K words
